facts.1: National Son and Daughter Day is celebrated on August 11th to honor the special bond between parents and their children.
facts.2: The day encourages parents to spend quality time with their sons and daughters, creating lasting memories.
facts.3: Activities on this day often include family outings, playing games, and sharing stories and experiences.

facts.1: National Raspberry Bombe Day celebrates the delightful raspberry bombe dessert, a frozen treat made with raspberry sorbet and ice cream.
facts.2: The dessert is typically shaped like a dome and garnished with fresh raspberries and other toppings.
facts.3: The day encourages people to enjoy this refreshing dessert, perfect for hot summer days.

facts.1: Play in the Sand Day is observed on August 11th to encourage people to enjoy the simple pleasure of playing in the sand.
facts.2: The day is a great opportunity for families to visit the beach, build sandcastles, and engage in other sand-related activities.
facts.3: Playing in the sand promotes creativity, relaxation, and outdoor fun for people of all ages.
